content.p: The School of Psychology has a wide range of outreach activities designed to excite and inspire schools and the wider community in the study of the human mind, brain, and behaviour. Follow the links below to discover our school engagement activities, visits and public events including Summer Scientist Week, our unique activity scheme for 4-11-year-olds and their families. There are other ways to get involved in our outreach and engagement at the School of Psychology. Find out more below: For opportunities to help shape our research and take part in experiments, visit the events pages for Café Connect or the recent posts on Facebook. Find out more about INTERACT – a multidisciplinary, cross-faculty initiative at the University of Nottingham combining on campus research facilities with a Pop-up Research Café in the city. University Park The University of Nottingham Nottingham, NG7 2RD For all enquires please visit: www.nottingham.ac.uk/enquire
